actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution directing the Secretary of Defense to furnish to the House of Representatives documents and other pertinent information relative to the extent of Cuban or other foreign military or paramilitary presence in the Republic of Panama or in the Panama Canal Zone.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to furnish to the House of Representatives information available to him relative to the extent of Cuban or other foreign military or paramilitary presence in the Republic of Panama or in the Panama Canal Zone.

titles.title: Resolution directing the Secretary of Defense to furnish to the House of Representatives documents and other pertinent information relative to the extent of Cuban or other foreign military or paramilitary presence in the Republic of Panama or in the Panama Canal Zone.
